properties.entry: Please provide a resolvable address of the LDAP server (IP or DNS)
Please insert DN of a user that is authorized to query the LDAP

An optional user filter to append to the default filter when loading users. The default user filter is created using the attribute specified by the username field. For example, if the username field is "uid", then the default user filter would be "(uid={0})" where {0} is dynamically replaced with the username being searched for.
Please insert DN that serves as the base for the search for users
Use the form below to specify the LDAP fields that match the profile fields. Fields that are left empty will not be mapped. Values enclosed in {} will be replaced with actual LDAP content.
The field name that the username lookups will be performed on. If this property is not set, the default value is {uid}. Active Directory users should try the default value {sAMAccountName}
The name of the LDAP field that contains the user's mail address
The LDAP field name that contains the user's first name
The name of the LDAP field that contains the user's last name
The name of the LDAP field that contains a thumbnail of the user's photo (binary)

An optional group filter to append to the default filter when loading groups. The default group filter is created using the group name. For example, if the group name field is "cn", then the default group filter would be "(cn={0})" where {0} is dynamically replaced with the group name being searched for.
Please insert DN that serves as the base for the search for groups
Use the form below to specify the LDAP fields that match the profile fields. Fields that are left empty will not be mapped. Values enclosed in {} will be replaced with actual LDAP content.
The field name that the group name lookups will be performed on. If this property is not set, the default value is {cn}.
The field name that holds the description a group. If this property is not set, the default value is {description}.
The field name that holds the members in a group. If this property is not set, the default value is {member}.
